explains: n. 年金，养老金；年金保险；年金享受权

sentences.en: He received a paltry annuity of $100.
sentences.cn: 他收到了微不足道的100美元年金。

sentences.en: Investors should consider putting some money into an annuity.
sentences.cn: 投资者们应考虑在年金上投入一些资金。

sentences.en: The present value factors are taken from the present value tables (annuity and lump-sum, respectively).
sentences.cn: 现值系数取自现值表（分别为年金和总金额）。
